summary: This is an email communication regarding public corruption matters pending for decision or resolution in early 2021, sent from and to the same office, likely internal correspondence within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Pending Public Corruption Decisions
events.description: Public corruption matters are still pending for decision or resolution in early 2021.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 8, 2020, regarding public corruption matters.
It indicates that certain public corruption decisions or resolutions are pending for early 2021.
The correspondence is internal to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The sender and recipient appear to be the same office or individual, as indicated by the identical 'From' and 'To' fields.
The subject of the email is 'pipeline', suggesting it may relate to a workflow or status update on cases.
